breakfast.name: Breakfast Burrito with Scrambled Eggs, Black Beans, and Avocado
breakfast.preparation: Scramble eggs in a pan. Heat black beans. Mash avocado. Warm tortilla. Assemble burrito with all ingredients. Add salsa and cheese (optional).
breakfast.nutritionalBenefits: Provides protein, healthy fats, fiber, and complex carbohydrates for sustained energy.
breakfast.healthNotes: Good source of protein and healthy fats to start the day, promoting satiety and muscle growth.

lunch.name: Chicken Quesadilla with Mexican Rice
ingredients: 1/4 cup Mexican rice (brown rice cooked with tomato, onion, and spices)
lunch.preparation: Place chicken and cheese on one half of the tortilla. Fold in half. Cook in a pan over medium heat until golden brown and cheese is melted. Serve with Mexican rice and salsa. Add sour cream (optional).
lunch.nutritionalBenefits: Provides lean protein, carbohydrates, and fiber. Mexican rice adds vitamins and minerals.
lunch.healthNotes: Balanced meal providing protein and carbohydrates for energy and muscle support.

dinner.name: Tacos al Pastor (using lean pork) with Corn Tortillas and Pineapple Salsa
ingredients: 4 oz lean pork (marinated in al pastor seasoning)
1/4 cup pineapple salsa (diced pineapple, red onion, cilantro, lime juice)
dinner.preparation: Cook pork. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with pork, pineapple salsa, and cilantro. Serve with a lime wedge.
dinner.nutritionalBenefits: Lean protein source. Corn tortillas are a source of complex carbohydrates. Pineapple salsa provides vitamins and antioxidants.
dinner.healthNotes: Lean protein supports muscle growth. Pineapple salsa adds a sweet and savory flavor and provides vitamin C.

snacks.name: Greek Yogurt with Granola and Berries
snacks.preparation: Combine Greek yogurt, granola, and berries in a bowl.
snacks.nutritionalBenefits: Provides protein, calcium, probiotics, and antioxidants.
snacks.healthNotes: Good source of protein and healthy fats to support muscle growth and satiety.
